The basket gave the 76ers a 99-98 lead, their first since midway through the third quarter. I went to the basket strong and shielded him off with my body, said Lynch, who is eight inches shorter than Shawn Bradley . New All-Star Michael Finley answered with a jumper at 28.4 seconds and appeared to be the hero again for Dallas when he snagged a rebound of Allen Iverson 's miss.

The Bexar County District Attorney's Office is taking advantage of all the tools of the 21st century. They are looking into cyberspace to find information on criminals, witnesses and prospective jurors. Watch David Letterman Sears' Report We will look at whatever is on the Internet. I think people need to be aware of that, said Bexar County District Attorney Susan Reed. That "whatever" includes Facebook. of inner peace," said Erika, who adopted one of the Michael Vick dogs, Oliver, and didn't want her last name used because she doesn't want herself or Oliver to be targeted for harassment. But I thought, no, no, no, don't get angry. Don't let a person like that ruin you. If I can't control what happens to him, I can control what happens to me and I can channel this anger into a big bunch of love. And so, she met Oliver, the dog they said would never kiss a human, but who now sleeps with his pet parent and showers her with kisses every morning when she wakes up.

As Google Inc. has grown, managing the business has become more complicated. So Larry, Sergey Brin and I have been talking for a long time about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making, Eric Schmidt said in a posting on the company's official blog. "And over the holidays we decided now was the right moment to make some changes to the way we are structured."
